Subject: How do you do form-based security in Heritrix?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225011788; y=2dZmMlnlMO4KxILyDzz1DrxTVRc8JTcaQjYGr5KqvUGp-QY

Someone here at Metacarta thinks there is a mechanism in Heritrix for 
providing credentials for session-based security, where you fill in a 
form with your credentials and post that.  I haven't seen this in the 
code - can somebody point me in the right direction?

Thanks,
Karl
